resources.string: DNDSync
Permissions
Sync - Phone preferences
Sync - Watch preferences
Android Auto preferences
Sync DND state to watch
If enabled, a DND change on the phone will lead to a DND change on the watch
Sync Bedtime mode to watch
Enable Bedtime mode on the watch whenever it is enabled on the phone
Enable Bedtime mode on DND sync
If enabled, DND changes on the phone will enable/disable Bedtime mode on the watch
Enable Power Save mode with Bedtime

Bedtime mode will also enable power save mode on the watch.\nManually switching off Bedtime mode on watch will NOT switch off power save mode. Switching off Bedtime mode on phone will switch off power save mode on watch
Sync DND state to phone
If enabled, a DND change on the watch will lead to a DND change on the phone. \nIf \"DND on Android Auto\" above is enabled, this option will be disabled as it may lead to conflict
Vibrate on sync
If enabled, 1 small vibration for DND sync, 2 small vibrations for DND and Bedtime sync
DND-Bedtime Permission
DND-Bedtime access granted
DND-Bedtime access denied
Monitor for Android Auto connections on phone
Force DND on watch if connected to a Android Auto on phone. \nIf this is enabled, then \"Sync DND state to phone\" below will be disabled as it may lead to conflict
Enable Power Save mode with Android Auto
AA mode will also enable power save mode on the watch
